title: The Engineer ReConditioned
description: Mysterious aliens, ruthless terrorists, androids with attitude, genetic manipulation, punch-ups with lasers and giant spaceships! What more do you want?Reprint of The Engineer with additional stories.- The Engineer- Snairls- Spatterjay- Jable Sharks- The Thrake- Proctors- The Owner- The Tor-beast's Prison - Tiger Tiger- The Gurnard
author: Neal Asher
